title: VALUE_IN
description: Returns TRUE if the provided object matches any of the specified compare values; otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: ...compare_values
parameters.description: One or more values to compare against.

examples:
VALUE_IN(3, 1, 2, 3)
-- Returns TRUE because 3 is one of the provided compare values.

VALUE_IN(SUBSTRING_AFTER(Email, "@"), "nvidia.com", "amd.com", "tesla.com")
-- Checks if the domain part of the field 'Email' (i.e., the substring after "@") matches any of the specified domains.
